# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is the website for the **Simulation and Optimization** book that will teach you the basics of simulation approaches and 
optimization techniques in the context of modern AI systems. The source code of the book and the examples
are provided as open-source and free to use [Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/) license.
